So we never got a chance to opent the package to try them on. I figured, well since the size 1 didn't fit her, the size 2 had too fit, right? Nope, big fat nope. Her toes are up to the tippity top. I'm devastated we missed the return window because I seriously can't afford to pay for shoes my kid can't wear. Especially not ones that cost me $40+ after taxes. I have a pair in adult women's sizes and they fit me perfectly, I wish the kids sizes did the same. I'm extremely disappointed and as a single mom who can't afford waste money on shoes that don't fit, I'm gutted that I won't be able to replace them with something that will fit her.
